Package org.apache.xmlgraphics.util

Various utilities used by the Apache XML Graphics project.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MimeConstants Frequently used MIME types for various file formats used by the XML Graphics project.
XMLizable This interface can be implemented by classes willing to provide an XML representation of their current state as SAX events.
 

Class Summary
ClasspathResource A class to find resources in the classpath by their mime-type specified in the MANIFEST.
DateFormatUtil  
DoubleFormatUtil This class implements fast, thread-safe format of a double value with a given number of decimal digits.
ImageIODebugUtil Helper class for debugging stuff in Image I/O.
QName Represents a qualified name of an XML element or an XML attribute.
Service This class handles looking up service providers on the class path.
UnitConv Utility class for unit conversions.
WriterOutputStream An OutputStream wrapper for a Writer.
 

Package org.apache.xmlgraphics.util Description

Various utilities used by the Apache XML Graphics project.
